pages.text: Using $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$(/l), selected ingredients and some experience the $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$(/l) enables you to add Enchantments to $(item)regular Books$().$(br2)While this process consumes more experience than enchanting in a common Enchanting Table you have granular control about which Enchantment you want to create.
You can also use this process to enchant your magical tools.
